programme.desc: Sraith sé chlár faoi éanlaith na spéire agus fiadhúlra na tíre. (This is a six part series about birds and other forms of wildlife around the country.)

programme.title: GAA 2024
programme.desc: An t-aicsean is fearr ó chluichí an deireadh seachtaine i Sraitheanna Allianz & Lidl Pheil na mBan. (Highlights of the weekend's best GAA and Ladies Football action.)

programme.title: Timpeall na Tíre
programme.desc: Achoimre ar chuid de mhórscéalta na seachtaine mar a craoladh ar Nuacht TG4. (Some of the stories from this week's regional news as seen on Nuacht TG4.)

programme.title: France 24
programme.desc: Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Tá Iaguar Óg sáinnithe in aimsir na ndineasár. An mbeidh sé ar ais in am don chóisir? (Dora & Diego retrieve Baby Jaguar from prehistoric times.)

programme.title: Digley & Dazey
programme.desc: Tógann Digley agus Dazey bothán ar an trá chun a scíth a ligean ann. (Digley and Dazey build a beach hut, complete with umbrellas and such for ultimate chill.)

programme.title: Digley & Dazey
programme.desc: Caithfidh an criú páirc a dhéanamh de sheanláthair dumpála atá in aice le monarcha. (The crew is given the job of turning a disused 'dump' area by a factory into a park.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Piocann Pip Zac ar a fhoireann in áit Posy agus níl Posy sásta! (When Pip picks Zac to be in his team for the wheelbarrow race Posy is upset.)

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
programme.desc: Tá Ollie in ann imeacht ar a rothar gan cobhsaitheoirí. Cleachtadh a dhéanann máistreacht! (Ollie has learned to ride his bike without stabilisers. Practice makes perfect!)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Tá Ricky ag rá gurb é a athair féin Seaimpín na nDineasár. (As the city prepares for a hot air balloon race, Ricky declares that the biggest champion in the world is Dad Saur.)

programme.title: Elmo & Tango, Mistéirí Mistéireacha
programme.desc: Tá slaitín draíochta Abby ar iarraidh, ní fios céard a tharla dó! (Abby's magic wand is missing, it's a mystery!)

programme.title: Abby's Amazing Adventure
programme.desc: Rachaidh Abby agus Rudy chuig an sorcas inniu! (Abby and Rudy are going to the circus today!)

programme.title: Pompon An Béirín Beag
programme.desc: Níl Mama thar mholadh beirte inniu. Tabharfaidh Pompon cúnamh do Dhaide aire a thabhairt di. (Mom is feeling under the weather today.)

programme.title: True agus Ríocht an Bhogha Ceatha
programme.desc: Tá na Sméara Blasta ar fad ar iarraidh. (True and Beartla have a huge mystery to solve!)

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: Tá Zee ag iarraidh teagmháil a dhéanamh le Sif sa spás. (Zee needs to contact Sif in outer space but can't because a bird has made its home on top of the satellite dish!)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Faigheann Romeo an ceann is fearr ar na Mascanna. Meas tú céard a bheidh i ndán anois dóibh? (After being defeated by their new powers, Romeo creates a power belt for Robot.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Garfield
programme.desc: Tá Garfield ag ceapadh gur cuma le daoine ar ann nó as é. (Garfield is depressed and thinks he makes no difference to the world.)

programme.title: Pat an Madra
programme.desc: Tá Lola ag iarraidh pearóid a thabhairt chuig an scoil. (Lola hears a parrot singing and wants to bring it to school to make him a big star.)

programme.title: Zak Jinks
programme.desc: Inniu breithlá Zak agus tagann sé ar a bhronntanas óna thuismitheoirí sula dtugtar dó é. (As it's Zak's birthday, he finds the present his parents have bought him.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Féachann Angelo agus Lola le cúnamh a thabhairt do Lámhaí Leitean teacht ar an rud a bhfuil sé go maith aige. (Angelo and Lola want to help Butterfingers find his own thing.)

programme.title: That's Joey
programme.desc: Caithfidh Joey scannán a dhéanamh in éineacht le Nóirín, an cailín is cúthaile sa rang. (Joey has to make a film with the shyest girl in his class.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Seal le Timmy
programme.desc: Dragan Síneach atá an rang a dhéanamh agus is é Timmy an t-eireaball. (Today the class are making a Chinese dragon and Timmy gets to be the tail.)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Tá damhsa dá gcuid féin ag na hainmhithe. Déanaimis aithris orthu! (Let's all get up and dance like the animals do!)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: An maith leat glasraí? Tá sé chomh maith dúinn amhrán a chasadh fúthu. (It's veggie time! Sing along with Mom and J. J. and have fun eating vegetables!)

programme.title: Gailearaí Scú Scú
programme.desc: Clár ealaíne ina ndéanann Máire Treasa ceardaíocht agus ealaín lena cara Scú Scú Scuab. (An exciting art series where Máire Treasa does arts and crafts with Scú Scú Scuab.)

programme.title: Is Mise
programme.desc: Rachaidh Róisín ag rámhaíocht i naomhóg i dteannta Eddie inniu. (Róisín gets the chance to go rowing in a currach with Eddie today.)

programme.title: Béiríní is a Leabhair
programme.desc: Faigheann na Béiríní amach gur féidir tomhas a réiteach ach na leideanna cearta a bheith agat. (The Bears learn that using clues can help solve a puzzle.)

programme.title: Bígí ag Ceol
programme.desc: Amhrán faoi bheith i do chaptaen eitleáin a bheidh le cumadh ag Gaelscoil Ultain i Muineachán. (Gaelscoil Ultain in Monaghan write a song about being an aeroplane captain.)

programme.title: Momonsters
programme.desc: Socraíonn na Momonsters dráma a dhéanamh. (The Momonsters learn how to act in a stage play.)

programme.title: Momonsters

programme.title: Kid E Cats
programme.desc: Téann na piscíní ar thuras traenach lena dtuistí. (The kittens and their parents take a trip on the train.)

programme.title: Blocdhathanna
programme.desc: Inseoidh Bándearg beagán dúinn faoi féin inniu. (Today, Pink tells us a bit about himself.)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: Beidh éin i líne, gadhar ag achrann agus gadhar ag glanadh fuinneog ar an gclár seo. (Today we'll see a row of birds, a sledding dog and we discover the window to a dog's soul.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years

programme.title: The Golden Girls

programme.title: Bailte
